a.name: href
a.description: This attribute contains the URL or URL fragment that the hyperlink points to.

a.name: hreflang
a.description: This attribute contains the URL or URL fragment that the hyperlink points to.

a.name: target
a.description: This attribute specifies where to display the linked URL.

a.name: type
a.description: This attribute specifies the media type in the form of a MIME type for the linked URL.

circle.name: cx
circle.description: This attribute defines the x-axis coordinate of the center of the element.

circle.name: cy
circle.description: This attribute defines the y-axis coordinate of the center of the element.

circle.name: r
circle.description: This attribute defines the radius of the element.

circle.name: pathLength
circle.description: This attribute lets specify the total length for the path, in user units.

clipPath.name: clipPathUnits
clipPath.description: This attribute defines the coordinate system for the contents of the <clipPath> element.

ellipse.name: cx
ellipse.description: The x position of the ellipse.

ellipse.name: cy
ellipse.description: The y position of the ellipse.

ellipse.name: rx
ellipse.description: The radius of the ellipse on the x axis.

ellipse.name: ry
ellipse.description: The radius of the ellipse on the y axis.

ellipse.name: pathLength
ellipse.description: This attribute lets specify the total length for the path, in user units.

foreignObject.name: height
foreignObject.description: This attribute determines the height of the rect.

foreignObject.name: width
foreignObject.description: This attribute determines the width of the rect.

foreignObject.name: x
foreignObject.description: This attribute determines the x coordinate of the svg container. It has no effect on outermost svg elements.

foreignObject.name: y
foreignObject.description: This attribute determines the y coordinate of the svg container. It has no effect on outermost svg elements.

line.name: x1
line.description: Defines the x-axis coordinate of the line starting point.

line.name: x2
line.description: Defines the x-axis coordinate of the line ending point.

line.name: y1
line.description: Defines the y-axis coordinate of the line starting point.

line.name: y2
line.description: Defines the y-axis coordinate of the line ending point.

line.name: pathLength
line.description: Defines the total path length in user units.

marker.name: markerHeight
marker.description: This attribute defines the height of the marker viewport.

marker.name: markerUnits
marker.description: This attribute defines the coordinate system for the attributes markerWidth, markerHeight and the contents of the <marker>.

marker.name: markerWidth
marker.description: This attribute defines the width of the marker viewport.

marker.name: orient
marker.description: This attribute defines the orientation of the marker relative to the shape it is attached to.

marker.name: preserveAspectRatio
marker.description: This attribute defines how the svg fragment must be deformed if it is embedded in a container with a different aspect ratio.

marker.name: refX
marker.description: This attribute defines the x coordinate for the reference point of the marker.

marker.name: refY
marker.description: This attribute defines the y coordinate for the reference point of the marker.

marker.name: viewBox
marker.description: This attribute defines the bound of the SVG viewport for the current SVG fragment.

mask.name: height
mask.description: This attribute defines the height of the masking area.

mask.name: maskContentUnits
mask.description: This attribute defines the coordinate system for the contents of the <mask>.

mask.name: maskUnits
mask.description: This attribute defines defines the coordinate system for attributes x, y, width and height on the <mask>.

mask.name: x
mask.description: This attribute defines the x-axis coordinate of the top-left corner of the masking area.

mask.name: y
mask.description: This attribute defines the y-axis coordinate of the top-left corner of the masking area.

mask.name: width
mask.description: This attribute defines the width of the masking area.

path.name: d
path.description: This attribute defines the shape of the path.

path.name: pathLength
path.description: This attribute lets authors specify the total length for the path, in user units.

pattern.name: height
pattern.description: This attribute determines the height of the pattern tile.

pattern.name: href
pattern.description: This attribute reference a template pattern that provides default values for the <pattern> attributes.

pattern.name: patternContentUnits
pattern.description: This attribute defines the coordinate system for the contents of the <pattern>.

pattern.name: patternTransform
pattern.description: This attribute contains the definition of an optional additional transformation from the pattern coordinate system onto the target coordinate system.

pattern.name: patternUnits
pattern.description: This attribute defines the coordinate system for attributes x, y, width and height.

pattern.name: preserveAspectRatio
pattern.description: This attribute defines how the svg fragment must be deformed if it is embedded in a container with a different aspect ratio.

pattern.name: viewBox
pattern.description: This attribute defines the bound of the SVG viewport for the pattern fragment.

pattern.name: width
pattern.description: This attribute determines the width of the pattern tile.

pattern.name: x
pattern.description: This attribute determines the x coordinate shift of the pattern tile.

pattern.name: y
pattern.description: This attribute determines the y coordinate shift of the pattern tile.

polygon.name: points
polygon.description: This attribute defines the list of points (pairs of x,y absolute coordinates) required to draw the polygon.

polygon.name: pathLength
polygon.description: This attribute lets specify the total length for the path, in user units.

polyline.name: points
polyline.description: This attribute defines the list of points (pairs of x,y absolute coordinates) required to draw the polyline

polyline.name: pathLength
polyline.description: This attribute lets specify the total length for the path, in user units.

rect.name: x
rect.description: This attribute determines the x coordinate of the rect.

rect.name: y
rect.description: This attribute determines the y coordinate of the rect.

rect.name: width
rect.description: This attribute determines the width of the rect.

rect.name: height
rect.description: This attribute determines the height of the rect.

rect.name: rx
rect.description: This attribute determines the horizontal corner radius of the rect.

rect.name: ry
rect.description: This attribute determines the vertical corner radius of the rect.

rect.name: pathLength
rect.description: This attribute lets specify the total length for the path, in user units.

svg.name: height
svg.description: This attribute determines the height of the rect.

svg.name: preserveAspectRatio
svg.description: This attribute defines how the svg fragment must be deformed if it is embedded in a container with a different aspect ratio.

svg.name: viewBox
svg.description: This attribute defines the bound of the SVG viewport for the current SVG fragment.

svg.name: width
svg.description: This attribute determines the width of the rect.

svg.name: x
svg.description: This attribute determines the x coordinate of the svg container. It has no effect on outermost svg elements.

svg.name: y
svg.description: This attribute determines the y coordinate of the svg container. It has no effect on outermost svg elements.

symbol.name: height
symbol.description: This attribute determines the height of the symbol.

symbol.name: preserveAspectRatio
symbol.description: This attribute defines how the svg fragment must be deformed if it is embedded in a container with a different aspect ratio.

symbol.name: refX
symbol.description: This attribute determines the x coordinate of the reference point of the symbol.

symbol.name: refY
symbol.description: This attribute determines the y coordinate of the reference point of the symbol.

symbol.name: viewBox
symbol.description: This attribute defines the bound of the SVG viewport for the current symbol.

symbol.name: width
symbol.description: This attribute determines the width of the symbol.

symbol.name: x
symbol.description: This attribute determines the x coordinate of the symbol.

symbol.name: y
symbol.description: This attribute determines the y coordinate of the symbol.

text.name: x
text.description: This attribute determines the x coordinate of the starting point of the text baseline.

text.name: y
text.description: This attribute determines the y coordinate of the starting point of the text baseline.

text.name: dx
text.description: This attribute allows to shift the text position horizontally.

text.name: dy
text.description: This attribute allows to shift the text position vertically.

text.name: rotate
text.description: This attribute set the orientation of each individual glyph.

text.name: lengthAdjust
text.description: This attribute determines how the text is stretched or compressed to fit the width define by the textLength attribute.

text.name: textLength
text.description: This attribute lets specify the width into which the text will be drawn.

textPath.name: href
textPath.description: This attribute defines the URL to the path or basic shape on which the text must be rendered. If the path attribute is also set, href as no effect.

textPath.name: lengthAdjust
textPath.description: This attribute indicates where length adjustement should be happening on text.

textPath.name: method
textPath.description: This attribute defines which method must be used to render individual glyphes along the path.

textPath.name: path
textPath.description: This attribute defines the path on which the text must be rendered.

textPath.name: side
textPath.description: This attribute indicates on which side of the path the text should be rendered.

textPath.name: spacing
textPath.description: This attribute lets specify how space between glyphes should be handled.

textPath.name: startOffset
textPath.description: This attribute lets specify how much the begining of the text should be offset from the begining of the path.

textPath.name: textLength
textPath.description: This attribute lets specify the width of the space into which the text will render.

use.name: href
use.description: This attribute defines the URL to element/fragment that needs to be duplicated.

use.name: x
use.description: This attribute defines the x coordinate of the use element.

use.name: y
use.description: This attribute defines the y coordinate of the use element.

use.name: width
use.description: This attribute determines the width of the use element.

use.name: height
use.description: This attribute determines the height of the use element.
